adudecalledleo.lionutils.unsafe

Interface UnsafeAccess


  • public interface UnsafeAccess
    Represents a proxy to the internal Unsafe class.
    Since:
    5.0.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int addressSize()
      Gets the current address size in bytes.
      HeapMemory allocate(long size)
      Allocates a block of memory on the heap.
      int arrayBaseOffset(java.lang.Class<?> arrayClass)
      Gets the base offset of an array class, AKA the offset to the first element.
      int arrayIndexScale(java.lang.Class<?> arrayClass)
      Gets the index scale of an array class, AKA the amount of bytes between each element.
      void copyMemory(java.lang.Object srcBase, long srcOffset, java.lang.Object destBase, long destOffset, long bytes)
      Copies a section of bytes from one Object's memory to another Object's memory.
      void ensureClassInitialized(java.lang.Class<?> c)
      Ensures that a class is initialized (all static initializer blocks invoked).
      static UnsafeAccess get()
      Gets the current Unsafe proxy.

      Gets a boolean from the base Object's memory.

        Returns:

      • setMemory

        void setMemory(java.lang.Object base,
               long offset,
               long bytes,
               byte value)
        Sets all bytes in a section of the base Object's memory to a specific value.
        Parameters:
        base - base object
        offset - offset to start from
        bytes - amount of bytes to set
        value - value to set bytes to

      • copyMemory

        void copyMemory(java.lang.Object srcBase,
                long srcOffset,
                java.lang.Object destBase,
                long destOffset,
                long bytes)
        Copies a section of bytes from one Object's memory to another Object's memory.
        Parameters:
        srcBase - source base object
        srcOffset - source offset
        destBase - destination base object
        destOffset - destination offset
        bytes - amount of bytes to copy

      • staticFieldBase

        java.lang.Object staticFieldBase(java.lang.reflect.Field f)

        Returns:
        base object of static field

        boolean shouldBeInitialized(java.lang.Class<?> c)
        Checks if a class should be initialized via ensureClassInitialized(Class).
        Parameters:
        c - class to check
        Returns:
        true if should be initialized, false otherwise

      • ensureClassInitialized

        void ensureClassInitialized(java.lang.Class<?> c)
        Ensures that a class is initialized (all static initializer blocks invoked).
        Parameters:
        c - class to initialize

      • initializeIfNeeded

        default void initializeIfNeeded(java.lang.Class<?> c)

        Initializes a class, if needed.

        Equivalent to:
         if (shouldBeInitialized(c))
     ensureClassInitialized(c);
        Parameters:
        c - class to initialize
